definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be sharp, keen (Aram. [[חֲדַד]]; NH [[חִדֵּד]] sharpen; Ar. h.ad=a be sharp and sharpen; As. Pi. uddudu, sharpen, Dl:Pr 174, W 121)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְחַדּ֫וּ מִזְּאֵבֵי עֶרֶב]] consec. Hb Hab 1:8 are keener than evening wolves (of impetuous Chaldean horses).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: [[הֵחֵד]] (Che Or Brd) or [[יַחֵד]] (Näg cf. Dr:§ 123 a, R), ins. Is 44:12 after LXX SyrVer: the smith sharpeneth an axe.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[הוּחַדָּה]] Ez Eze 21:14, Eze 21:15, Eze 21:16 be sharpened (in all, subj. [[חֶרֶב]]).—Vid. also 1. [[חדה]].
